entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 12:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: E 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:57 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 12:57 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
